languages.text: {n}Когда прохладная ладонь Леди Кассии согревается в ваших руках, девушка неловко высвобождает ее, стараясь не задеть вас острыми когтями.{/n} "Я... С вашего позволения, Лорд-капитан, я бы хотела провести немного времени наедине. И обдумать... случившееся".

traits.locale_text: {n}Когда прохладная ладонь Леди Кассии согревается в ваших руках, девушка неловко высвобождает ее, стараясь не задеть вас острыми когтями.{/n} "Я... С вашего позволения, Лорд-капитан, я бы хотела провести немного времени наедине. И обдумать... случившееся".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}When Lady Cassia's cold hand warms in yours, she awkwardly retracts it, trying not to prick you with her sharp nails.{/n} "I... By your leave, Lord Captain, I would like to spend some time alone. And think about... what has transpired."
languages.original_text: {n}Когда прохладная ладонь Леди Кассии согревается в ваших руках, девушка неловко высвобождает ее, стараясь не задеть вас острыми когтями.{/n} "Я... С вашего позволения, Лорд-капитан, я бы хотела провести немного времени наедине. И обдумать... случившееся".

traits.locale_text: {n}When Lady Cassia's cold hand warms in yours, she awkwardly retracts it, trying not to prick you with her sharp nails.{/n} "I... By your leave, Lord Captain, I would like to spend some time alone. And think about... what has transpired."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}When Lady Cassia's cold hand warms in yours, she awkwardly retracts it, trying not to prick you with her sharp nails.{/n} "I... By your leave, Lord Captain, I would like to spend some time alone. And think about... what has transpired."

traits.locale_text: {n}When Lady Cassia's cold hand warms in yours, she awkwardly retracts it, trying not to prick you with her sharp nails.{/n} "I... By your leave, Lord Captain, I would like to spend some time alone. And think about... what has transpired."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}When Lady Cassia's cold hand warms in yours, she awkwardly retracts it, trying not to prick you with her sharp nails.{/n} "I... By your leave, Lord Captain, I would like to spend some time alone. And think about... what has transpired."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cuando la fría mano de lady Cassia se calienta en la tuya, la retira avergonzada, procurando no arañarte con sus afiladas uñas.{/n} «Yo... con su permiso, Lord Capitán, quisiera estar sola un rato. Y pensar en... lo que ha sucedido».
languages.original_text: {n}When Lady Cassia's cold hand warms in yours, she awkwardly retracts it, trying not to prick you with her sharp nails.{/n} "I... By your leave, Lord Captain, I would like to spend some time alone. And think about... what has transpired."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando la fría mano de lady Cassia se calienta en la tuya, la retira avergonzada, procurando no arañarte con sus afiladas uñas.{/n} «Yo... con su permiso, Lord Capitán, quisiera estar sola un rato. Y pensar en... lo que ha sucedido».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}レディ・カシアの冷たい手があなたの体温で徐々に温まると、彼女は鋭い爪で傷つけないように注意をはらいながらぎこちなく手を引っ込めた。{/n}「あの…お許しいただけるなら、しばしひとりにしていただけませんか、ロード・キャプテン。今、何が起きたのか…じっくり考えたいと思います」
languages.original_text: {n}When Lady Cassia's cold hand warms in yours, she awkwardly retracts it, trying not to prick you with her sharp nails.{/n} "I... By your leave, Lord Captain, I would like to spend some time alone. And think about... what has transpired."

traits.locale_text: {n}レディ・カシアの冷たい手があなたの体温で徐々に温まると、彼女は鋭い爪で傷つけないように注意をはらいながらぎこちなく手を引っ込めた。{/n}「あの…お許しいただけるなら、しばしひとりにしていただけませんか、ロード・キャプテン。今、何が起きたのか…じっくり考えたいと思います」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}卡西娅冰冷的手在你掌心间逐渐变暖。她尴尬地将手从你的手中抽出来，小心翼翼地避免尖锐的指甲把你划伤。{/n}“我……恕我冒昧，舰长大人，我想一个人待一会，好好思考一下……刚刚发生的事情。”
languages.original_text: {n}When Lady Cassia's cold hand warms in yours, she awkwardly retracts it, trying not to prick you with her sharp nails.{/n} "I... By your leave, Lord Captain, I would like to spend some time alone. And think about... what has transpired."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅冰冷的手在你掌心间逐渐变暖。她尴尬地将手从你的手中抽出来，小心翼翼地避免尖锐的指甲把你划伤。{/n}“我……恕我冒昧，舰长大人，我想一个人待一会，好好思考一下……刚刚发生的事情。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Une fois la main de dame Cassia réchauffée par la vôtre, elle la retire maladroitement en tentant de ne pas vous griffer avec ses ongles pointus.{/n} « Je... Si vous me le permettez, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, j'aimerais rester seule un moment. Pour réfléchir à... ce qu'il vient de se passer. »
languages.original_text: {n}When Lady Cassia's cold hand warms in yours, she awkwardly retracts it, trying not to prick you with her sharp nails.{/n} "I... By your leave, Lord Captain, I would like to spend some time alone. And think about... what has transpired."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une fois la main de dame Cassia réchauffée par la vôtre, elle la retire maladroitement en tentant de ne pas vous griffer avec ses ongles pointus.{/n} « Je... Si vous me le permettez, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, j'aimerais rester seule un moment. Pour réfléchir à... ce qu'il vient de se passer. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Als Lady Cassias kalte Hand sich in deiner erwärmt, zieht sie sie beschämt weg. Sie achtet darauf, dich dabei nicht mit ihren scharfen Nägeln zu kratzen.{/n} "Ich ... Mit Eurer Erlaubnis, Lord Captain, wäre ich gern kurz allein. Um darüber nachzudenken ... was geschehen ist."
languages.original_text: {n}When Lady Cassia's cold hand warms in yours, she awkwardly retracts it, trying not to prick you with her sharp nails.{/n} "I... By your leave, Lord Captain, I would like to spend some time alone. And think about... what has transpired."

traits.locale_text: {n}Als Lady Cassias kalte Hand sich in deiner erwärmt, zieht sie sie beschämt weg. Sie achtet darauf, dich dabei nicht mit ihren scharfen Nägeln zu kratzen.{/n} "Ich ... Mit Eurer Erlaubnis, Lord Captain, wäre ich gern kurz allein. Um darüber nachzudenken ... was geschehen ist."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}When Lady Cassia's cold hand warms in yours, she awkwardly retracts it, trying not to prick you with her sharp nails.{/n} "I... By your leave, Lord Captain, I would like to spend some time alone. And think about... what has transpired."

languages.text: {n}Soğuk eli seninkinin altında ısındığında Leydi Cassia; çekinerek, keskin tırnaklarını sana batırmamak için de gayret ederek elini geri çekiyor.{/n} "Şöyle ki... İzninle biraz yalnız kalmak istiyorum Lord Kaptan. Tüm... Olan biteni düşünmek istiyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}When Lady Cassia's cold hand warms in yours, she awkwardly retracts it, trying not to prick you with her sharp nails.{/n} "I... By your leave, Lord Captain, I would like to spend some time alone. And think about... what has transpired."

traits.locale_text: {n}Leydi Cassia'nın soğuk eli seninkinin altında ısındığında, Cassia çekinerek elini geri çekiyor. Keskin tırnaklarını sana batırmamak için gayret ediyor.{/n} "Şöyle ki... Gittiğinde biraz yalnız kalmak istiyorum Lord Kaptan. Tüm... Olan biteni düşünmek istiyorum."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
